<title level="1" right="Trait">[Arcane](/Traits.aspx?ID=11)</title>

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 628 <sup>4.0</sup></row>

This magic comes from the arcane tradition, which is built on logic and rationality. Anything with this trait is [magical](/Traits.aspx?ID=103).
name: Arcane
